1.0.0.name: wordpress/google-news-sitemap
1.0.0.description:
Automatically generate sitemap for inclusion in Google News.

More info:

  • More info on Google News Sitemap, with info on how to configure it.
  • Check out the other Wordpress plugins by the same author, and read his blog: Andrea.
  • Example of created sitemap in PallamanoItalia

Changelog

1.0.9

  • Fix on excluded posts

1.0.8

  • Scheduled posts fix thanks to Elliot
  • Fix on PreassRelease naming
  • Fix on implode notice

1.0.7

  • solved a bug with strict mode

1.0.6

  • solved bug relative to post and category exclusion

1.0.5

  • bug fix
